title: Science Smarts for the Classroom ts

und.value: [caption id="attachment_299" align="alignleft" width="300" caption="The Water cycle"][/caption] Looking for information on natural resources, natural hazards, geospatial data, and more? The USGS Education site provides great resources, including lessons, data, maps, and more, to support teaching, learning, K-12 education, and university-level inquiry and research.
